name: get_sources
description: Search a knowledge base for sources to ground and give context to answer a user question. Use only if the requested information is not already available in the conversation context.

question.description: User question (i.e., how can I execute task A?, etc.)

name: get_groundedness
description: Compute the groundedness evaluation score for a question-answering task based on the provided sources and answer

answer.description: Answer created by the assistant (i.e., To execute task A you need to access system B.)

sources.description: Full text of the sources used by the assistant to answer the user question (i.e., [file1.pdf] To execute task A you need to access system B. [file2.pdf] System B is used when users need to execute task A.)
